home.expertPlatform: Expert-T is a platform for connecting translators & customers.
home.theHighlight: The highlight of Expert-T is that customers can see all of the translator's information displayed on the application,allowing them to select the Expert who best meets their needs.

teaser.content: Expert-T is designed with positivity in mind, because weâ€™re here tomake your translation a good one. Easily connect unlimited real-time interpreter.

pricing.advanced: Advanced services for global users-strongly connect people

interpreter.tilte1: Whenever you need translation during your travels, business trips or while studying a language just bring Expert-T. Call now - Fast and accurate interpretation in all contexts supported by a team of experienced interpreter. You can choose your own interpreter that you think they are suitable the most.

translation.Advanced: Advanced services for global users - Strongly connect people around the world.

translation.Send: Send Message: discuss in more detail about the deal!
translation.contentSend: In cases you want to translate documents, transactions, contracts... needs high accuracy in each detail, contact the translator directly via text message in the translator function. We are always ready to support you wherever you are

footer.title: Expert T
footer.textFirst: to use are Expert-T's top priorities.
footer.textSecond: We strive to provide the best life solutions while also connecting friends all over the world.
footer.textThird: We allow translators in liberating their strengths and utilizing their abilities in languages.
footer.textFourth: Also, Expert-T connects customers with translators who can meet their needs in the quickest and most efficient manner.

popup.title: Welcome to
popup.question: Expert-T: Beta version
popup.content: Language is Not Longer an Obstacle for Us
popup.text-second: for the first log-in Experts & users
popup.text-end: Be a part of us now!

translations.title: Translation
translations.content: In cases you want to translate documents, transactions, contracts... needs high accuracy in each detail, contact the translator directly via text message in the translation function. We are always ready to support you wherever you are.

conversation.title: Conversation
conversation.content: Conversation model suitable for meetings, learning and teamwork. The translation team with a lot of experience working in many fields will definitely impress you.

register.title: What we do best
register.content-first: Are you looking for a job that you can do from anywhere in the world? Do you want to earn money while you travel? If so, then working as a translator may be the perfect opportunity for you! Translators are in high demand all over the world, so no matter where you go, you will be able to find work.
register.content-second: Creating opportunity jobs for yourself is a great way to get ahead in your career. Be a part of us !

step-register.title: 3 Easy Step To Be An Expert
step-register.fillout: Register & Fill Out your information to be an expert
step-register.2: Choose the service you want to use: Translation - Interpretation - Conversation
step-register.3: Scroll and select the employee you think best fits your needs
